Articles.Content:
So i saw in the deve pictures they had a set orbit window up and i was wondering how do i replicate that?

I know how to find and use the Debug toolbar.

But how do i get the set orbit one?

Because i wanted to test a few things with the EVAs...
Dunno, maybe Ctrl+Alt+Shift+O. It would make sense. Try mashing different combinations.

that\'s most likely a debugging tool for only the devs to use. It is likely not included when you download the game.

the mechjeb mod makes orbits as easy as pressing 'launch'. you can find it in the plugin-powered addon section of the forums.
Considering the debug thing was left in, I reckon all the other tools are there too, just hidden.
